de.hsrm.swt02.persistence

Interface Persistence

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistenceImp

    public interface Persistence
    Interface for the dependency injection of the persistence implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • storeWorkflow

        String storeWorkflow(Workflow workflow)
                     throws PersistenceException
        store functions to store workflows, items, and users into persistence.
        Parameters:
        workflow - is a workflow for storing
        Returns:
        id of stored workflow
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if the storing process failed
        PersistenceException

      • loadWorkflow

        Workflow loadWorkflow(String id)
                      throws PersistenceException
        Method for loading a workflow.
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of the requested workflow.
        Returns:
        workflow is the requested workflow
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if any error in database occurs.
        PersistenceException

      • loadAllWorkflows

        List<Workflow> loadAllWorkflows()
                                throws PersistenceException
        Method for loading all workflows into a list of workflows.
        Returns:
        List is the list we want to load
        Throws:
        WorkflowNotExistentException - if the requested workflow is not there
        PersistenceException - if any error in database occurs

      • loadAllForms

        List<Form> loadAllForms()
                        throws PersistenceException
        getter for all forms.
        Returns:
        List of all forms
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if an error in persistence occurs

      • save

        void save()
        Method for saving all relevant data on server during shutdown. All DataModels are serialized in a file which path is configured in server configuration file.

      • load

        void load()
        Method to load the data model from file system. File is read, in case of reading errors or missing file some default test data is load.

      • setStoragePath

        void setStoragePath(String storagePath)
        Sets the storage path from logic to persistence.
        Parameters:
        storagePath - the path for persist the data model.
